{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Writ of Brenthis Torega 
| icon           = poe2 expedition_report_p4 icon.png
| description    = On order of the most holy brenthis to be executed forthwith until withdrawn:

Jadaferlas the Ancient grows restless of late. Seek additional bodies with which to satiate the beast. The boundary for patrolling the island shall be expanded by fifteen leagues.

And do not forget - the Ancient prefers larger game when possible.

May the goddess burn ever stronger within you,

Brenthis Torega
